title: Maggie Hassan confessed to her role in Doxing Pockets?
subtitle: The charges arose from an incident in which another former staff member hacked Hassan ' s computers and published the addresses of the organization ' s congressmen.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Samantha Davis, a former employee assistant to Sin Maggie Hassan, pleaded guilty to offences related to hacking government computers and issuing addresses to Senators GOP during the final confirmation hearing of the United States Supreme Court.
